channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Will Encounter a Very Different Middle East in His Second Term
item.description: The region has changed dramatically since the Oct. 7 attacks.

item.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger’s 3 tips for staying active as you age: ‘Don’t think, just get going’
item.description: Exercise isn’t supposed to be a luxury for older adults, but it can be hard to get moving again. The “Terminator” star is back to help.

item.title: North Korea Blasts Unbearable Sounds To South Korea
item.description: Relations between the neighbors have sunk to the lowest level in years. Now, Pyongyang is blaring eerie sounds across the border that villagers say is...

item.title: Thousands Report Netflix Livestream Crashes During Mike Tyson-Jake Paul Fight
item.description: Users across the U.S. reported being unable to load the high-profile boxing match.

item.title: The No. 1 thing you can do to help your kids become ‘fully functioning, successful adults’
item.description: The single best gift you could ever give your kid, says psychologist Dr. Becky Kennedy, "is the ability to handle hard things.”

item.title: Is soy good or bad for you? We asked experts and here’s the verdict
item.description: People have long been told to avoid soy, but experts say it could be one of the best foods for you.

item.title: Barcelona legend Gerard Piqué thinks he’s created the perfect sport for Gen Z’s falling attention span
item.description: The Kings League, which Piqué calls “football with a video game,” is building a massive youth-based audience.

item.title: Biden Discusses With Allies ‘Dangerous’ Cooperation Between Russia and North Korea
item.description: The president said stronger ties with South Korea and Japan are working, but did not address whether President-elect Donald J. Trump would continue hi...

item.title: How Elon Musk Cuts Costs at Tesla, SpaceX and X

item.title: Kennedy’s Views Mix Mistrust of Business With Unfounded Health Claims

item.title: To stop the next Ticketmaster-style meltdown, Congress must pass the TICKET Act before the buzzer—Sports Fans Coalition
item.description: HR 3950, the Transparency In Charges for Key Events Ticketing Act, has been in the making for two years.

item.title: As Xi and Biden Meet, Trump and Uncertainty Loom Large
item.description: The two leaders will meet in Peru, where China has steadily expanded its influence in a challenge to the United States in its own region.
